subject: Identification of 2-3 stretches for developing as Model Stretches.
text: HRlv <7lv TTTHTfxifedrut 7hv Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (4s7 4Rdr7 3R] {ToTATf 1A1q4) 5a Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 & 6, #er-10, #RGT, T ferit-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Tech & Misc./2020 No. 18.44/2020 dated the 18th 2020 Sub.: Identification of 2-3 stretches for developing as Model Stretches. Refer the discussions during the meeting through VC held on 21.04.2020 in which each RO was directed to develop 2-3 stretches of not less than 15 km each preferably in & near the state capital as model roads of NHAI with surface, plantation, safety items, road signs, etc and these NHAI stretches should be all features of a best road which can also serve educational purpose, by showing this model stretch to other NHAI/ State PWD Engineers as to how a good road should look and what all features it should have_ 2_ ROs   might have identified the stretches by now: The list of activities & timelines for developing Model Stretches are enclosed. ROs shall take all required actions promptly; complete the activities as per timelines and upload their achievements with photographs/ video on PMS. Member concerned is given powers to sanction the estimates of items outside the scope of projects upto Rs.10.OCr: per stretch and mode of execution. The proposals of higher estimates be put up to EC. Encl.: List of Activities & Timelines. O~L (Sukhbir Singh Sandhu) Chairman AlI ROs/ PDs Copy to: All Members All CGMs/ GMs at HQ 41 RT RT 9I NHAL May; good riding having
